title: Alibaba : quarterly gross merchandise volume Q2 2012-Q2 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total GMV in billion yuan for 17 number of Quarters.
The Total GMV in billion yuan is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '12.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 755.0 more Total GMV in billion yuan than the lowest Quarter Q2 '12.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Total GMV in billion yuan in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '15 has the highest Total GMV in billion yuan and Q2 '12 has the lowest Total GMV in billion yuan.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total GMV in billion yuan for 17 number of Quarters.
The Total GMV in billion yuan is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '12.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 755.0 more Total GMV in billion yuan than the lowest Quarter Q2 '12.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total GMV in billion yuan for 17 number of Quarters.
The maximum Total GMV in billion yuan 964.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '15 and the minimum is found at Q2 '12 where Quarter is 209.0.
The maximum Quarter Q4 '15 has got 4.61 times higher Total GMV in billion yuan than the minimum Quarter Q2 '12.
Quarter Q4 '15 is higher than any other Quarters with value 964.0, followed by Q2 '16, and Q4 '14. Down to Quarter Q2 '12 with the lowest value 209.0.
The Total GMV in billion yuan has lowered over the past 17 Quarters.
The highest value 964.0 at Q4 '15 is almost 1.8 times larger than the average value 536.94.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 9127.94.
